name: 劉英彥
objective:
本課程讓學生實際演練家具設計程序及創新方法，配合家具材料、家具結構與實習、家具製圖、電腦輔助家具設計等課程，以習得家具創新設計與產品工程的能力。

The program allows students to practice furniture design procedures and innovative methods, cooperate with furniture materials, furniture structure and practice, furniture drawing, computer-aided furniture design and other courses to achieve the ability of furniture innovation design and engineering.

9. 期中發表
10. 體驗 / 介面設計
11. 色彩材質設計
